info.name: Firefox - Active Tab Shadow
info.description: Adds a shadow effect to the active tab and makes inactive tabs transparent. Works with tabs on top or bottom.
info.additionalInfo:
This style requires that inactive tabs be made transparent so that the shadow on the right side of the selected tab will not be obscured by the tab to the right of it. Transparency allows the shadow to be seen through the obscuring tab.

This style fits in well with the following styles:

style 33773
style 46694

data.title: Brilliant. It's Beautiful. and it's oh So Classy. It's what you want and didn't think of.
